entries.cannot_register_bad_loc: You cannot register at a location that is not registered with the planetary map.
entries.cannot_register_no_support: This location does not support active/inactive registration status.
entries.cannot_register_not_neutral: Neutrals may only register at neutral (non-aligned) locations.
entries.cannot_register_wrong_faction: You may not register at a location that is factionally opposed.
entries.cannot_register_already_reg: But you are already registered at this location.
entries.success_register: You successfully register with this location.
entries.cannot_register_lack_skill: You lack the appropriate skill-set to activate this location.
